name: The Adventures of Stanley (Prologue)
description:
Follow a grumpy Scotsman and his equally-grumpy Miniature Schnauzer (Stanley) as they try to find a place to go for a walk without hazards (it's harder than you think!)

This game was developed in Bitsy and serves as a prototype for a future project about environmental hazards from the perspective of dog-walkers. It is a short experience which conveys the basic components that the game will feature, including: 

  • adventuring and discovery; 
  • item collection;
  • a candid narrative and monologues;
  • danger(?!)
